name: LegeroSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on Bedroom.”
”Alexa, turn off Bedroom.”
”Alexa, dim bedroom by 10 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This skill is for monitor and control Legero Smart Lights.you can give voice command to Smart light to change On/Off status and to controll dimming. You can also set ROOM for lights with Alexa app.
For Using this skill you need have Legero Smart light and connected with internet through your home wifi. if you do not have legero smart light then you will not able to use it.
For using this skill you need to have Legero Smart mobile app loging credentiala. So first instal "Legero Smart" mobile app, create an account then come to add alexa skill.
this skill can be used in India and US .
